mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNo, c.partNumber, c.cartCount, c.memberNo, p.partName, p.partNo, p.partPrice, m.modelName FROM CART c JOIN PART p ON c.partNumber = p.partNumber JOIN MODEL m ON p.modelNo = m.modelNo WHERE c.memberNo = #{memberNo}
SELECT cartNo, partNumber, cartCount, memberNo FROM CART WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} and partNumber = #{partNumber}
